String.name: Mighty Phoenix
String.string: Damage from enemies decreases by 50% for short time after resurrecting.
String.tooltip: Decreases damage taken by 50% for {value1} seconds after resurrection.

String.name: Agile Phoenix
String.string: Movement Speed increases for short time after resurrecting.
String.tooltip: Movement Speed increases by {value1} for {value2} seconds after resurrection. Ends as soon as you enter combat.

String.name: Empowered Speed
String.string: Increases Movement Speed of any mount by 20. Effect will not be activated within 5 minutes.
String.tooltip: Movement Speed increases by 20 for {value1} when traveling on mounts. Effect cooldown is 5 minutes.

String.name: Mighty Attack
String.tooltip: Power increases by {value1}.

String.name: Mighty Defense
String.tooltip: Endurance increases by {value1}.

String.name: Lethal Lesson
String.string: Crit Resist Factor increases for 5 seconds when hit by critical attack. Crit Resist Factor increases on each critical attack from enemies.
String.tooltip: Increases Crit Resist for 5 seconds by {value3}% chance when critically attacked. Crit Resist increases by {value2} when critically attacked for the first time, and increases by {value4} with each attack from enemy. Can increase to a maximum of {value1}.

String.name: Combat Speed Up
String.string: Combat Movement Speed increases for 3 seconds upon casting skill.
String.tooltip: Combat Movement increases by {value1} for 3 seconds.

String.name: Ready Pummel
String.string: Crit Factor for your first attack increases for 5 seconds upon casting spell.
String.tooltip: Crit Factor for first attack increases by {value2} for {value1}% chance.

String.name: Concentration
String.string:
RE consumption decreases upon casting skill.
Recovers additional RE when RE is below 20%.
String.tooltip: RE consumption decreases by {value1}. Recovers additional RE when RE is below 20%.

String.name: Strengthen
String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1}.

String.name: Vigorous Charge
String.string: Replenishes MP on successful attack. Replenishes RE when target has aggro on you
String.tooltip: Restores RE by {value2} on successful attack against target with aggro on you, and restores MP by {value1} on successful attack against target without aggro on you.

String.name: Strengthen
String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1}.

String.name: Strengthen
String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1}.

String.name: Amplification
String.tooltip: Damage from poison increases by {value1}%.

String.name: Trample
String.string:
EP Attack Power increases when successfully hitting knocked-down target.
EP Attack Power triples when hitting knocked-down target with critical hit.
String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1} when successfully hitting knocked-down target. EP Attack Power triples on successful critical.

String.name: Turning Tables
String.tooltip: Resets cooldown by {value1}% chance when knocked-down.

String.name: Strengthen
String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1}.

String.name: Reload
String.string: Resets Skill Cooldown on successful attack with your next skill within 2 seconds after successfully hitting target.
String.tooltip: Resets Skill Cooldown by {value1}% chance on successful attack with your next skill within 2 seconds.

String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1}.

String.string: Increases Casting Speed of Rising Fury
String.tooltip: Increases Casting Speed of first two hits by {value1}%

String.name: Force
String.string: Increases Power for 10 seconds upon casting skill. Also increases Power by 1 with each successful attack on target.
String.tooltip: Power increases by {value2} for 10 seconds, and Power increases by 1 in {value3}% chance when skill successfully hits the target. Power can increase by a maximum of {value1}.

String.name: Extra-Force
String.tooltip: Force effect duration increases by {value1} seconds.

String.name: Strengthen
String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1}.

String.string: Combat Movement Speed increases for 5 seconds upon casting skill.
String.tooltip: Combat Movement Speed increases by {value1} for 5 seconds.

String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1}.

String.name: Impact
String.string: Knocks down target on successful attack.
String.tooltip: On successful attack, has a {value1}% chance to knock down monsters, and a {value2}% chance to knock down players.

String.name: Strengthen
String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1}.

String.name: Blood Leech
String.string: Recovers HP on successful attack with maximum decrease of Endurance due to Combative strike.

String.name: Strengthen
String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1}.

String.name: Wound
String.string: Decreases Movement Speed for 3 seconds and constantly decreases total HP on successful attack.
String.tooltip: Movement Speed decreases by {value1}% and has a {value4}% chance to deal periodic damage of {value2}%( {value3} max) of max HP every second, on successful attack.

String.tooltip: Resets cooldown by {value1}% chance on successful attack.

String.string: Constantly replenishes MP upon casting skill. Ends when successfully attacking target or being attacked.

String.tooltip: Replenishes HP by {value1}, HP restoration doubles when total HP is below 20%.

String.name: Enchant
String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1}.

String.name: Counter
String.tooltip: Crit Factor increases by {value1} on successful critical.

String.name: Enchant
String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1}.

String.name: Critical Pummel
String.string: Increases Crit Factor of the next attack for 30 seconds on successful attack 3 times.
String.tooltip: Increases Crit Factor of the next attack by {value1} for 30 seconds on successful attack 3 times.

String.name: Counter
String.tooltip: Crit Factor increases by {value1} on successful critical.

String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1}.

String.tooltip: Damage received while casting skill decreases by {value1}%.

String.name: Combat Speed Up
String.string: Combat Movement Speed increases for 3 seconds upon casting skill.
String.tooltip: Combat Movement increases by {value1} for 3 seconds.

String.name: Reload
String.string: Decreases Skill Cooldown on successful critical with Ground Bash and Glaive Strike.
String.tooltip: Decreases Skill Cooldown of Windslash by {value1} seconds on successful critical with Ground Bash and Glaive Strike.

String.name: Enchant
String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1}.

String.name: Constancy
String.tooltip: Duration time increases by {value1} seconds.

String.name: Turning Tables
String.tooltip: Resets cooldown by {value1}% chance when knocked-down.

String.name: Lunar Recharge
String.tooltip: {value1}% chance to recover 100 Ragnarok Points on Casting.

String.name: Enchant
String.tooltip: EP Attack Power increases by {value1}.

String.name: Wound
String.string: Decreases Movement Speed for 3 seconds on successful attack. Constantly decreases total HP.
String.tooltip: On successful attack, has a {value4}% chance to reduce target's Movement Speed by {value1}% and deal damage equal to {value2}%( {value3} max) of target's max HP every second.
